div.div:
Service Contract (WSDL)
Loose Coupling
Service Abstraction
Service Reusability
Service Autonomy
Service Statelessness
Service Discoverability
Service Composability

div.div:
SOA:
Centralized ESB
Enterprise-wide scope
SOAP/WSDL
Shared databases OK
Microservices:
Decentralized (smart endpoints)
Application scope
REST/lightweight protocols
Database per service

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
